mapper.select: select camp_id,style_name,style_qty from tbl_camp_style as cs, tbl_style_name as sn where cs.style_no = sn.style_no and camp_id=#{camp_id};
select camp_id,facility_name from tbl_camp_facility as cf, tbl_facility_name as fn where cf.facility_no = fn.facility_no and camp_id=#{camp_id};
